department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Supplying twenty-six (26) carbon steel resilient charnier bushings and fifty-eight (58) carbon steel blind rivets for the aggregate service of TAC 6.
full_summary:
# Buoy Cast Iron Counterweight Government Tender Announcement
## Title (English and French) {#title}
Request for Proposal - Pierrescontre poids de mâtuartin castér TonCartco-Eagle
Contrepoids en my@Columnenate PierreGr paveCarjeTierendriller

## Reference Number and Amendment Number {#reference}
Reference: PW-XAQ-031-7863 | Amendment: 1
Solicitation Number: F6839-224003/A

## Tenders Dates {#tenders}
- Publication Date: 2022-08-26
- Tender Closing Date for Receipt: 2022-09-22T12:30:52

## Description of Goods and Services {#description}
The Government of Canada, through Public Works and Government Services Canada, is soliciting proposals from interested suppliers to provide Grey Cast Iron Counterweights for 2.9M buoys for the Canadian Coast Guard. The total quantity required is 40 units.

### Scope of Work
The work involves supplying forty (40) Grey Cast Iron Counterweights to Canadian Coast Guard Base in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Delivery and Administration
The contractor must deliver the goods within the specified timeframe. The contracting authority shall be the Public Works and Government Services Canada.

### Legal and Commercial Obligations
This procurement is governed by Canadian free trade agreements and is subject to the laws of Canada.

## Evaluation Criteria {#evaluation}
The lowest bid will be selected based on a single criterion - Lowest Price.

## Trade Agreements and GSIN Classification
The trade agreements involved in this procurement are the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The NIBS/UNSPC code for the goods and services are N2040A and N2050A respectively
